INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , PASSWORD , NAME , BIRTH_DATE , GENDER , EMAIL , PHONE , ENROLL_DATE) VALUES (? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SHIPPING_ADDRESS (SHIP_NO , SHIP_ADDR , SHIP_ADDR_INFO , PHONE , ZIPCODE , MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_SHIP_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?)
SELECT NAME , MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = ? AND PHONE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CART C INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = ?) AS CART_COUNT, M.* FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = ? AND M.PASSWORD = ? AND M.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET NAME = ? , BIRTH_DATE = ? , GENDER = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND PASSWORD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND PASSWORD = ?
